name: Survive The ColdWar
description:
"""Hold space to speed up the game when needed"""
this game was SOLO made in 4 days by Mohey al deen al Mardiny for the historically accurate game jam 3 
the theme is: "Cold war" 
so many things were planned to be put in the game ( nuclear actions - war declaration - revolutions -.... )but lack of time made me short it for now , if you like the game let me know so i may complete it ...
looking forward for your feedback!

the goal of the game is to balance the power between the two enemies, Capitalism and Communism

you control both of them , each one has three variables : power,money,people Satisfaction
you lose when the difference in power is massive,you can keep track of how dangerous the situation is by looking at the percent on the up right corner of screen , when it reaches 100 you lose
you win by surviving till year 1991 with the nuke danger meter is below 100.

How to play :(sorry for not making a tutorial i was really so short on time )
click on the soviet union to select the Communisms or click on America to select the Capitalism
once one of them is selected "Act" button in the left down corner is active.
press it to select an action each displays what it does 
you can know the selected country by the color of "Act" button ( red for Communism ,blue for Capitalism )
every month ( displayed in the down right corner) the numbers are updated according to each country sources

Hold space to speed up the game when needed
one last thing : the president of the countries changes regularly (4 years for Capitalism , 7 years for Communism )
you choose the next president , some times you have to choose a weak one to restore the balance

i wish you could survive the cold war and the whole humanity with you
